title: Fandango (1985) Kevin Costner (Widescreen,Stereo,subs) DVDrip
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089126/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089126/</a>

Optional English subtitle in separate idx/sub files.

One of Kevin Costner's very first films, I cannot understand why there is no torrent for it anywhere, so I made a rip. Really funny and entertaining: A bunch of friends go on a road trip before they are drafted for the Vietnam war in the early '70s. Gives a good demonstration of how you can drag your dead car into action with a moving freight train, and how you should NOT perform your first parachute jump.

Surprisingly, the DVD has widescreen and stereo. Not bad for a film produced at that time. 

2-pass DVDrip Xvid 704x384, AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
